author: Special Correspondent
text:
A woman official with a national bank in Dindigul lost her seven sovereigns of gold chain when a motorbike-borne robber snatched it at Duraisamy Nagar here on Thursday night.

The police said that the victim, G. Jagadambal of Namashivaya Nagar was riding on a two-wheeler, when the robber followed her on Shalini Street at Duraisamy Nagar and yanked her gold chain at around 9 p.m.

The S. S. Colony police are investigating.
title: Chain snatched at Duraisamy Nagar
